newsitem.title: HONG KONG: SVCD Kelon in JV to make fridges in N.Ch.
newsitem.headline: SVCD Kelon in JV to make fridges in N.Ch.

text.p: China's Guangdong Kelon Electrical Holdings Co Ltd said on Thursday it had formed a joint venture with two mainland firms to make energy saving refrigerators in north China.
The joint venture -- Yingkou Kelon Refrigerator Co Ltd -- was formed with Pearl River Electrical Refrigerator Co Ltd, a unit of Kelon, and Yingkou Freezer Co Ltd, it said in a statement.
The new company will manufacture chlorofluorocarbon-free energy-saving refrigerators and parts, as well as managing sales and after-sales services in north China, Kelon said.
The new venture cost 240 million yuan and will be fully operational by end of this year with an annual production capacity of about 500,000 refrigerators, the company said.
Kelon, together with Pearl River, owned 63 percent of it, and the rest was taken up by Yingkou Freezer, it said.
